/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A solitary figure can be seen walking on the sidewalk, adding a touch of life to the otherwise still image. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds, casting a soft light that illuminates the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky.
